reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of MECH 223, MECH 260.
Co-reqs: MECH 360 and one of MECH 328, ENPH 253, IGEN 330.
Associated with tutorial sections T1A, T1B, T1E.
Associated with T1C, T1D, T1F.
description: Selection of flexible drives, bearings, hydraulic system components, and couplings. Design of bolted joints and power screws. Design and selection of gears, gear trains, and mechanisms.
